section.title: Overview
section.para: JBoss Developer Studio 4.1 is a major release of the Eclipse based IDE developed and supported by Red Hat (the visual tooling components are supported for 3 years, and the runtime platform for 5 years). The IDE, which is available for Windows, Linux and OS X, provides tooling that allows for rapid Web 2.0 application development on the JBoss Enterprise Application Platform. This release also improves support for SOA application development with the JBoss Enterprise SOA Platform.
JBoss Developer Studio 4.1.2 contains a fix for the slow synchronization of a virtual database in Teiid Designer.
